caption.p: Models of the evolution from superhydrophobicity to superamphiphobicity. (a) Microscale synapse model. (b) Micro-/nanoscale synapse model. (c) Cassieâ€“Baxter state model. (d) Various developed artificial micro-/nanoscale models. (e) Pyramid micro-/nanoscale model shows optimal comprehensive performance. (f) Classical superamphiphobic models from T-shaped to mushroom-shaped to triply reentrant structure.
